website_summaries.verdict: Impressive kit for teens and adults who are looking to make unique pieces of leather jewelry.
pros: Has many different beads, making it easy to customize each piece of jewelry
Kit possesses items in both vibrant and neutral colors
Allows user to create up to 5 unique pieces of jewelry
cons: One of the included cords is tough to string beads onto

customer_reviews.title: Beads Aren’t Large Enough for Strings
customer_reviews.text: Very cute packaging and pretty decorations. Unfortunately none of the beads have holes that are large enough to go over any of the strings included. I’ll have to go out and buy new beads and string which defeats the purpose of this kit. This kit also didn’t include how to end the first bracelet which led to the bracelet completely falling apart after almost an hour of work on it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: As seen in picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture. I think my daughter will love it
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: My 10 year old niece loved this and created some pretty cool jewelry with it
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old niece loved this and created some pretty cool jewelry with it. Her friends loved the items, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Marie

customer_reviews.title: Stylish gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for a 10+ girl. The jewelry looks like something you get at the store. Very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: dudette

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: super fun. Should have the option of black cording. Necklaces are cheap metal that stains the neck
customer_reviews.author: Shelly C

customer_reviews.title: Trendy and great quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved receiving this as a gift from her grandparents! The materials are of high quality and they look like trendy jewelry you would buy at a boutique!
customer_reviews.author: Scooter1411

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nieces, she was excited to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Savana

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this . She got this item for her birthday. She loves creating jewelry and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: dennis graves

customer_reviews.title: Lots of little pieces, but an awesome gift for a kid or adult that likes crafts!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my daughter for Christmas. She's 9 and absolutely loved it. It was so easy for her to do.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift to a 7 year old and she was ecstatic
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn

customer_reviews.title: Cute, easy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and the 8 year old that received it, loved it. All of the items in the kit were nice quality and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Mellentine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is the gift I’ve given for everyone of my daughters friends for birthday or Christmas! Yes it’s such a perfect gift for girl’s. I’ve ordered multiple times and have always received positive feedback. Best of all it’s pretty cool when my daughter returns from a play date and have a new necklace she made with her friend.
customer_reviews.author: L.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for a teen
customer_reviews.text: "Easy to do once you get the hang of it"....this is the review from my 14 yr. old granddaughter. All decorations were cute and trendy. Great gift idea for a teen. Only down side, one of the cords were difficult to thread the beads. The rest were fine. Great tools included. High quality packaging for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: C G Sammartano

customer_reviews.title: Great gift option.
customer_reviews.text: This company has really nice sets for older children. My daughter loved this set. The set has many pieces to customize your jewelry and it is a great quality. The packaging keeps all of the pices in their place. This is a great option for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen H.

customer_reviews.title: It was ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and never heard anything or saw them wear it, so probably wasn't the gift of the year, but looked fun to make.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Hsuan

customer_reviews.title: Fun for summer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kit, for the older girls, had the neighbors come over and make jewelry too! Fun summer kit
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Be careful opening! But Great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes this. My only critique is that you have to be super careful when first opening the packaging. The little beads fly everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: M Crosby

product_meta.title: STMT DIY Leather Jewelry Kit by Horizon Group Usa, Create 5 Unique Vsco Girl Leather Jewelrypiece. Metallic Beads, Suede Cording, Spike Beads, Shells Included
product_meta.description: Style:Leather JewelryExplore various jewelry making techniques while creating trendy accessories with the STMT D.I.Assembly leather jewelry kit! Weave, knot, and braid your way to an armful of leather bracelets or create a colorful statement necklace with spiked beads. The easy-to-follow instruction booklet includes 4 different jewelry designs to follow, but don't be afraid to get creative and come up with original designs! Add a boho touch to your pieces by incorporating a Cowrie shell, or keep it classy and weave in some metallic seed beads. The STMT D.I.Assembly leather jewelry kit is ideal for the aspiring jewelry designer or lover of all things leather! Kit includes: 5 ft. Thin leather cording – 11 ft. Thick leather cording – 10 in. Braided faux leather cord – 16 – 6 mm jump rings – 3 lobster clasps (spelled wrong on packaging) – mini pliers – metallic seed beads – 10 – 10 mm jump rings – 2 – 1 yd. Suede cords – 15 How lite beads – 10 spiked how lite beads – 2 painted Cowrie shells – 10 crimps – instruction booklet.
feature_bullets: Combine the different cording and beads to create unique, colorful pieces
Follow along with the instruction booklet to learn 4 different designs or let the creative juices flow and come up with your own
Includes all of the tools and materials necessary to get started
The perfect D.I.Y. Gift set for the aspiring jewelry designer or lover of all things crafty

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
